notes.author: Jane Wilson
notes.content: Client expressed concern about rising property values and whether current limits are adequate. Discussed conducting formal property valuation.

notes.author: Tom Jenkins
notes.content: Property valuation completed by ABC Valuation Services. Report indicates building replacement cost at LOC1 should be increased by approximately 20% to account for current construction costs.

notes.author: Jane Wilson
notes.content: Client expanding product line to include components for medical devices. This represents increased product liability exposure that should be addressed at renewal.

recommendations.description: Increase property limits to align with current valuation

renewal.strategy: Market all lines for competitive quotes. Focus on addressing identified coverage gaps and managing premium costs with potentially higher limits.
